short: The Supercomputer Education and Research Centre (SERC) is India's leading center for high-performance computing and data science, housed at the prestigious Indian Institute of Science (IISc), Bangalore.
directorMessage: Welcome to SERC. Our mission is to provide state-of-the-art supercomputing infrastructure for the nation, fostering research and development in all areas of science and engineering. We are committed to pushing the boundaries of computational research.
overview: Established in 1990, the Supercomputer Education and Research Centre (SERC) at the Indian Institute of Science (IISc) has been at the forefront of high-performance computing in India. The center houses India's most powerful supercomputers, including PARAM Pravega, and supports a wide range of research activities, from climate modeling to computational biology. Our goal is to enable researchers to solve complex problems and to train the next generation of computational scientists.
